channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Tink
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Tink

item.title: CVE-2020-8929|2024-08-04T10:12:11.052Z -- google%20llc -- tink
item.description: A mis-handling of invalid unicode characters in the Java implementation of Tink versions prior to 1.5 allows an attacker to change the ID part of a ciphertext, which result in the creation of a second ciphertext that can decrypt to the same plaintext. This can be a problem with encrypting deterministic AEAD with a single key, and rely on a unique ciphertext-per-plaintext.
